"Considerate la vostra semenza: fatti non foste a viver come bruti, ma per seguir virtute e canoscenza" Dante Alighieri Divina commedia Inferno, canto XXVI Research interests and activities I'm Assistant Professor in Computer Science at the Department of Mathematics of the University of Padova. My research interests are in the areas of Cyber-Physical Systems, hybrid automata, finite automata, temporal representation and reasoning, spatial and temporal logics.
